mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards(title, content, usersId, createdAt) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{usersId}, now())
mapper.select:
SELECT b.id, b.title, case when u.username is null then '익명' else u.username end username FROM boards b LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON b.usersId = u.id
WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY b.id DESC OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
